external_games.name: Light Speed Bike: Motor Cycle Rider Game Pro

name: Light Speed Bike: Motor Cycle Rider Game Pro
summary: Light Speed Bike: Motor Cycle Rider Game Pro is a 3D bike rider game with crazy power ups. Experience the ultimate endless game: fly, slide, and jump through the endless chase to grab your coins. Very few gamers could reach the 1 million point mark - are you one of them??? 3D graphics which will keep you hooked! Collect Gems on the way and reach 1 Million Points.
